text: Anɨb ak, nɨbi God ne bɨ yɨmug nɨgep abe, bɨ mɨlɨk nɨŋɨd yul awl ñeb abe mɨdeb agɨl, anɨb ak gos nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb. Binɨb nop kelɨgɨl kɨdek ma gɨpal okok, kɨlop mɨlɨk nɨŋɨd yul awl ñub. Nɨbi pen God gos ne kɨdek gɨl dɨtep genɨmɨb, nɨbop yɨmug nɨgup. Pen nɨbi anɨgɨl ma genɨmɨb, nɨbop abe tɨpag lɨl dɨyokɨnɨgab.
